name: OR_LNLG_SLN
description: This table contains information on sentinel lymph node readings.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SENTINEL_LYMPH_NODE
columns.description: Which sentinel lymph node is being documented on

columns.name: SLN_LOCATION
columns.description: Where the sentinel lymph node is on the patient

columns.name: SLN_IN_VIVO_READING
columns.description: Reading of the sentinel lymph node bed in vivo

columns.name: SLN_EX_VIVO_READING
columns.description: Reading of the sentinel lymph node bed ex vivo

columns.name: SLN_DYE_PRESENT_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether dye is present at the sentinel lymph node bed
